backend/main.mo: Defines school and daily report data models, manages storage, and exposes admin- and user-restricted APIs for saving and retrieving schools and daily reports.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes along with global base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that sets metadata, favicon, and loads the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, role-based routing, and switching between admin and Kepsek dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActiveScho: Admin UI section that fetches, filters, and displays a searchable table of active schools with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Displays cards showing active school count and today's report submissions using query hooks with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Generates 7‑day trend and completion analytics from today's reports and visualizes them with Recharts, including loading fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/admin/KepsekProf: Form for creating or editing a school profile with validation and submission via saveSchool mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Monitoring: Shows a ranked table of today’s reports with score badges and detail view modal, sortable by total score.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportDeta: Modal dialog showing detailed daily report info including photo, score breakdown, and date.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component displaying the app title, logo, and a logout button that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/Attendanc: Handles attendance photo upload with validation, preview, progress tracking, and removal.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/DailyRepo: Form for submitting a daily report, computing scores from inputs and saving via mutation with validation.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/ProfileSe: Form dialog for school principals to enter and save school profile details using saveSchool mutation.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/TodaySubm: Displays today's submitted daily report with score breakdown, attendance photo, and edit option.
frontend/src/components/StatusPills.tsx: Provides badge components that display score values and submission status with color-coded visual indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for roles, schools, and daily reports using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with blue‑green palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind‑merge for class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Shows an access denied message with logout functionality clearing identity and queries.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page displaying summary cards, analytics, active schools, and monitoring table.
frontend/src/pages/AdminKepsekManagement: Admin page for registering and managing principal school profiles, displaying instructions and toggling a form for profile creation.
frontend/src/pages/KepsekDashboardPage.t: Principal dashboard showing school profile data, today's submission status, and access to the daily report form or summary.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with a styled card layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in session storage, and managing persisted values across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, themes, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app purpose, architecture notes, features, and versioning metadata.
